mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.case_id AS "caseId", a.punish_code AS "punishCode", a.legal_basis AS "legalBasis", a.legal_basis_content AS "legalBasisContent", a.discretion AS "discretion", a.punish_money AS "punishMoney", a.invest_report AS "investReport", a.fact AS "fact", a.investigator AS "investigator", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tcase_handle( case_id, punish_code, legal_basis, legal_basis_content, discretion, punish_money, invest_report, fact, investigator, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{caseId}, #{punishCode}, #{legalBasis}, #{legalBasisContent}, #{discretion}, #{punishMoney}, #{investReport}, #{fact}, #{investigator}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tcase_handle SET punish_code = #{punishCode}, legal_basis = #{legalBasis}, legal_basis_content = #{legalBasisContent}, discretion = #{discretion}, punish_money = #{punishMoney}, invest_report = #{investReport}, fact = #{fact}, investigator = #{investigator}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE case_id = #{caseId}
